page.title: 18BUCKLEY DETENTION CENTRE
page.content: Buckley Hall has been a detention centre since 1966. It employs 48 male and 9 female full time workers, and also 24 part time workers. They are only allowed 3 visitors in every 2 week period from 1.30_3.30p.m. 7 days a week. During the day they do things like P.E.,Art,Woodwork and have education classes.They are in the cricket league and are top of the football league.Also they play table tennis, rugby and have weight lifting contests.On Saturday night they are allowed to watch T.V. and video's. There can be up to 150 inmates who stay there for about 2_12 weeks for things like stealing cars, shoplifting burglary,fighting, criminal damage and theft.The boys mainly come from West Yorkshire and Liverpool and there are afew from Lancashire.
